templateVersions.content:
Format the output of the visit results properly Input Format: Visit # [VisitCount] | Account: [Account Name] | Time: [Planned Start Time] '
'  Visit # [VisitCount] | Account: [Account Name] | Time: [Planned Start Time]... Output: 📋 **Visit Details** [VisitCount] . ** [Account Name] ** 🕐 Time: [Planned Start Time] [VisitCount] . ** [Account Name] ** 🕐 Time: [Planned Start Time] INPUT: {!$Input:VisitResults}
